scripts.init: npm ci && fvtt configure set installPath '/Applications/Foundry Virtual Tabletop 11.app/Contents/MacOS' && fvtt configure set dataPath '/Users/zorkon/Library/Application Support/FoundryVTT' && fvtt workon "hucaen-module" --type "module"
scripts.build: npm run init && npm run pack:deities
scripts.pack:deities: fvtt package pack --in src/packs --out packs -n deities-of-hucaen -r
